WorkItem.Description:
Rawr intermitently freezes when left clicking on an item.  this happens under win xp and vista home.  XP has .net 3.5 and Vista has .net 3.5 sp1.  I have also had rawr freez when trying to edit an item.
Â 
The only way I have been able to recover is to kill the task thru the task manager.
WorkItem.Summary: Rawr freezing when left clicking on an item

Comments.Message: It would help to know which model this happens with. Also is this something that is repeatable or totally random?

I have only used the Tankadin model.  By left clicking on an item slot and opening the list of upgrades and then immediately clicking on a different slot it was freezing consistantly.  

I just rebooted my XP system and I can no longer get this to happen.  rebooting didnt affect the vista system the other night and it happened several times there.  I will investigate further tonight when I get home.
